plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Enter SIM PIN, you have %d remaining attempts.
Enter SIM PIN, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message_bottom
plurals.item: You have %d attempts left
"You have %d attempts left. Should you still fail to unlock, contact your operator to unlock this device. "

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_bottom
plurals.item: "You have %d attempts left. "
"You have %d attempts left. Should you still fail to unlock, contact your operator to unlock this device. "

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message_bottom
plurals.item: You have %d attempts left to enter the correct code. Should you still fail to unlock, contact your operator to unlock this device
You have %d attempts left to enter the correct code. Should you still fail to unlock, contact your operator to unlock this device

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code_bottom
plurals.item: You have %d attempts left to enter the correct code. Should you still fail to enter the correct code, the SIM card will self-destruct.
You have %d attempts left to enter the correct code. Should you still fail to enter the correct code, the SIM card will self-destruct.
